com.zhukovsd.graphs

Class GraphView<T extends Graph<U>,U extends com.zhukovsd.graphs.Vertex>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zhukovsd.graphs.GraphView<T,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of represented graph
    U - type of vertex of represented graph
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmbeddedGraphView

    public abstract class GraphView<T extends Graph<U>,U extends com.zhukovsd.graphs.Vertex>
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of graph, which can be painted on java.awt.Graphic object.
